name: _id
description: The address of the account, in bech32 encoding. Same as `address`.

name: address
description: The address in bech32 encoding. Should be equal to the `_id` field.

name: balance
description: The EGLD balance, in atomic units. E.g. '1500000000000000000' means 1.5 EGLD.

name: balanceNum
description: See `balance`. This value is expressed in EGLD.

name: nonce
description: The sequence number of the address.

name: timestamp
description: The last moment when the address balance was changed.

name: developerRewards
description: The developer rewards (for smart contract calls), in atomic units of EGLD. E.g. '1500000000000000000' means 1.5 EGLD.

name: developerRewardsNum
description: See `developerRewards`. This value is expressed in EGLD.

name: totalBalanceWithStake
description: Total balance of the account, including the staked amount, in atomic units of EGLD. E.g. '1500000000000000000' means 1.5 EGLD.

name: totalBalanceWithStakeNum
description: See `totalBalanceWithStake`. This value is expressed in EGLD.

name: currentOwner
description: The address in a bech32 format of the current owner of the smart contract. This field is populated only for the smart contract addresses.
